description:
With the ever-changing field of wireless communication, it is critical for engineers to stay up to date on the latest advancements. Having a solid foundation of fundamental concepts is imperative to understand more advanced technologies. Providing a team with the opportunity to engage in training and to learn about these advancements together can support their […]

The post Support Team Engagement and Innovation with Wireless Communications Training appeared first on EE Times.
title: Support Team Engagement and Innovation with Wireless Communications Training

More compute intensive AI is heating up mobile devices, which need clever cooling solutions.

The post Cooling Chip Combats Smartphone Heat appeared first on EE Times.
title: Cooling Chip Combats Smartphone Heat
